captions.text: and how it’s a shame that we can’t work together
We work together to get things done
Every damn day, every damn day
we work together every damn day
Sometimes the light at the end of the tunnel
The press can hold its magnifying glass up to our problems
Or they can use that magnifying glass
And then perhaps host a week of shows
on the sudden flaming ants epidemic
Every damn day, every damn day
We work together every damn day
Sometimes the light at the end of the tunnel
It's just New Jersey, just just New Jersey

comments.text:

FORCED in asian, african & middle eastern countries?

ONLY white countries? 

Why is intermarriage NEVER glamorized & propagandized in african, asian & 
middle eastern countries?

Why are asians, africans & middle easterners NEVER lectured about how "we 
can end racism by intermarriage and becoming a "blended humanity and pretty 
mocha color"?

This so called "diversity" BS is a trojan horse; an Orwellian code word for

comments.text:
+MrWarjak Say, for example, China has an avalanche of non Chinese FORCIBLY 
"integrated" into their country & encourages them to "assimilate" (you 
know...to "intermarry")?

Fifty years later, everyone brags about how the Chinese will soon be a 
minority in their country & be blended into a "pretty mocha color" with the 
non Chinese - in order to end "racism".

What if this exact scenario was repeated in  (ONLY)  Asian countries ?

Everyone would easily recognize a blatantly obvious plan to eliminate 
Asians - ie GENOCIDE.

Yet we have this EXACT same scenario (ie GENOCIDE) occurring ONLY in white 
countries.

This supposed strength "diversity" is a scam - in reality, just a code word 
for white GENOCIDE.
comments.author: john smith

comments.text:
Its funny. I come from a country where they glamorize the supposed 
*appearance* of what someone from my country should be, but my country has 
had a very long history (apparently denied by many considering the 
logistics) of blending and intermingling of different kinds of people from 
the outside. And even now they look down on Americans and foreigners. At 
least its better in comparison those children of multi-racial parents who 
live in Korea and get the xenophobe stigma even worse.

comments.text:
+john smith  So you wanna know who I am? A german student in the age of 23. 
I'm studying economics. I am 6 feet 5 inches tall blonde hair blue eyes 
(the perfect aryan you might say ;D). I am member of a left wing party and 
single atm. My interests are politics, computer games, basketball (but 
mostly because I am the tallest of the bunch and just have to stay under 
the basket) and gettin super wasted with friends. I hope that satisfy your 
interests in the invisible person =D. And who might you be? To your 
question: Of course I am against genocide but I think the genetic 
enlargement through crossbreeding is a good thing because it helps to 
prevent birth defects. Look at all the asthma and allergies that wouldn't 
be happening. Furthermore I don't see a nessecity for white people. I mean 
it's ok when they are there but it's also ok if not. It's evolution. If 
white people are inferior to other races they deserve to be exterminated. 
Or in this case it's ok if they fade away through crossbreeding.
